description.value: The Emberseekers are an aloof conclave of rangers and woodsfolk. They watch over and guard the ancient cycle of wildfire, ash, sapling, and forest, and bind themselves to elemental spirits of flame in pursuit of this balance. While their methods may seem extreme, they can be relied upon to oppose any monster that threatens the natural cycles of their lands.

system.classDetails:
Standalone Archetype: Emberseeker

Unlock: When you reach 3rd level overall and have at least one level each in a Martial and Spellcaster class.

Class Features at Higher Levels

Class Categorization: Martial
Rest Dice Gain After 1st Level: 1d8 per Emberseeker level
Hit Point Gain After 1st Level:
- 1d8 + your Constitution modifier
- Or 5 + your Constitution modifier
Mana: +2

Spellcasting Attribute: Abilities in this class use the same spellcasting attribute as your @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.58I1UTE8ZV4CJ5W6]{Adherent Ember} cantrip.

➢ Spell Save DC: 8 + your proficiency bonus + your spellcasting attribute modifier.

🆓 Given Abilities: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.1P73PV63XRZZ06AX]{Seeker's Knack}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.06UDKKP6BQGSGKF8]{Primordial Bond}

Emberseeker Abilities

When taking a level in Emberseeker, you may choose from the following abilities:

Options: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.0XE5EBEOURNKXDWE]{Smoldering Quiver}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.RZWY2QVJ74LA8RZ6]{Kindled Companion}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.6Q8NPXGTPOTSP2KO]{Ashen Drift}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.17T1JOINDUGBWTGS]{Fuel the Flames}
